channel.title: Dimitris Glezos' old personal site - transifex

item.title: Greek Prime minister talks about Indifex
item.description:
Yesterday both me and Indifex were unexpectedly honored to be mentioned by the Greek Prime Minister as one of the best examples of innovative companies in Greece.

The Prime Minister was giving a talk at the biggest exhibition/fair in Greece (and probably the Balkans) which was broadcasted live by …
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Big-picture release translation status
item.description:
A lot of things are happening lately in Transifex-land. We’ve been working hard in bringing transifex.net live, developing Lotte, the Lightweight Online Translation Editor, recruiting two more developers for Indifex, opening up a new office and stuff.

Been experimenting with new things too. One of them was various …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: jespern / django-piston / wiki / Home — bitbucket.org
item.description: Giving a good look at django-piston. Looks hawt!
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: FOSSComm recap
item.description:
So, FOSSComm is now over and everyone has returned to their base after a really fun weekend. Kudos to the Linux Team of TEI Larisas for the excellent organization, and a big thanks to the TEI itself for sponsoring some great swag and coffee/food!

Day 1 ended with the …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Transifex appliance on cloud computing
item.description: Testing a Transifex appliance running on Amazon’s EC2 for customers. rPath rocks.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Tx interview on greek radio
item.description: Tx was featured on a popular Greek radio station past week. I really enjoyed the discussion, where we had the opportunity to talk about the importance of universal access of information, open source and digital rights, beautiful code and entrepreneurship.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: startup2.eu and Tx
item.description: Transifex on the startup2.eu European web 2.0 competition! Votes are openly accepted at http://www.startup2.eu/upcoming.php.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Transifex GSoC Ideas
item.description: RT: @transifex: Coder currently in University? Take a look at the Transifex GSoC Ideas @ http://transifex.org/wiki/Development/SummerCoding
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Transifex in yum for Fedora 11
item.description: Reviewers needed for packaging Transifex in Fedora’s yum repositories in time for Fedora 11. Also, Python packaging gurus might want to drop their 0.02 to the Django application packabing thread on fedora-devel.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Hacking in bed
item.description: Late-night hacking in bed feels pretty good, I should do this more often.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos
